languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search for files in the current workspace

pattern.description: Search for files that match this glob pattern

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd webview && npm install
scripts.//build:development: used by launch/tasks json to start the extension. watchWithDashboard then runs. See it for further details.
scripts.build:development: cd webview && npm run build:development && cd - && NODE_ENV='development' node esbuild.cjs
scripts.//build:production: builds the extension and builds/minifies/bundles the webview
scripts.build:production: tsc -p ./ && eslint src && cd webview && npm run build:production && cd - && NODE_ENV='production' node esbuild.cjs
scripts.//package:dry: shows what a built vsix file would contain
scripts.//package: creates a vsix file for installing the extension.
scripts.//publish: runs all build/package steps and publishes the output to the marketplace.
scripts.publish: npm run package; npm version patch -m 'Upgrade to version %s'; vsce publish
scripts.//test: test uses nodemon since trying to coordinate all the separate tools' watches was horrible
